abstract: Dan Bartlett, a former adviser to President George W. Bush, will succeed Leslie Dach, a former Clinton White House staff member, as executive vice president for corporate affairs.
snippet: Dan Bartlett, a former adviser to President George W. Bush, will succeed Leslie Dach, a former Clinton White House staff member, as executive vice president for corporate affairs.
lead_paragraph: To continue burnishing its image, Wal-Mart has replaced a former Clinton White House aide with a former Bush White House staff member.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Hires Former Bush Aide as Chief Image Maker
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Hires Former Bush Aide as Chief Image Maker
